dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringment & Fraud site on your server URGENT
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 01, 2006 9:11 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringment & Fraud site on your server
URGENT

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Tuesday, February 28,
2006 at
5:31:07 AM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] Copyright Infringment & Fraud site on your server URGENT

MESSAGE BODY:
To whom it may concern.

IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED - COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT & FRAUDULENT WEBSITE

My name is Darrell Tuck, I am the owner of the domain INTERLOTTO.COM

I contacted your company regarding a copyright infringement and a fraudulent
program, which is hosted on your site. I received a reply informing me that
although it is obvious that your hosting customer has stolen our material,
and is commiting a fraud, it does not comply with your procedures and as
such the website is still active and ripping people off.  Because this
matter is to do with a fraud and because we are in another country it is not
expedient for us to deal with this matter via traditional land post, thus we
are hoping to deal with the matter via email communications.

 [a] Attached is the file interlot-uk.jpg which is a screen shot of our UK
website at http://www.interlotto.com/uk
(Note: we have taken the action of placing a SCAM warning message on this
URL, you will find a link to the new active page at the above URL) The above
UK webpage was created by us back in 1996 and we are the sole copyright
holder of all material contained within. A search on any search engine will
show you that we have been around for some time now.
[b] Attached is the file ukcopyright02.jpg which is a screen shot of the
offending webpage. There are 9 webpages attached to
UKNATIONALEMAILLOTTERY.COM which are exact copies of our website at
http://www.interlotto.com/uk - Note some material has been changed,
including the addition of their name on the copyright tag at the bottom of
the page.
[c] You can contact me at win@interlotto.com [d] I Darrell Tuck hereby state
that I have given NO permission for the site UKNATIONALEMAILLOTTERY.COM to
use our copyrighted material. I hereby state that the above information is
true and correct.

In addition to this copyright complaint, it is very clear from our
investigations that this website is commiting a fraud. This type of scam is
widespread on the internet and as a legitimate operator we are proactive in
dealing with all illegal activity (especially that which uses our materials
to commit their fraud) - This website and its operations have been picked up
by the Fraud watchdog site http://www.419legal.org and we have been working
with them to deal with these criminals & their sites which are hosted on
legit sites such as your own. The website 419legal.org became aware of this
site after several spam/fraud complaints, which I am sure is yet another
breach of your useage policy.


Regards

Darrell Tuck
win@interlotto.com
